wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Francis Hugh Plowden  (15 August 1851 – 24 August 1911) was a British Army officer.

response: * Francis Plowden (British Army officer) (1851–1911), British general
* Francis Plowden (businessman) (born 1945), lay member of the U. K. Judicial Appointments Commission

* Francis Plowden (British Army officer) (1851–1911), British general
